statements.insert:
select SEQ_SM_POUNDSITE_INFO.nextval as IntId from dual
insert into SM_PoundSite_Info ( I_INTID, C_PoundSiteNo, C_PoundSiteNickName, I_PoundSiteType, C_PoundSiteName, C_PoundSiteIP, C_PoundSiteAddress, I_PoundSiteStatus, N_Range, N_Accuracy, C_REDOPEN,
C_DVRIP, C_CREATEUSER, C_CREATETIME )values ( #IntId#, #PoundSiteNo#, #PoundSiteNickName#, #PoundType.IntValue#, #PoundSiteName#, #PoundSiteIP#, #PoundSiteAddress#, #PoundSiteStatus.IntValue#, #Range#, #Accuracy#, #IsRedOpen.EntityValue#, #DVRIP#, #createUser#, to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss')
)
statements.update:
update SM_PoundSite_Info set C_PoundSiteNo = #PoundSiteNo#, C_PoundSiteNickName = #PoundSiteNickName#, I_PoundSiteType = #PoundType.IntValue#, C_PoundSiteName = #PoundSiteName#, C_PoundSiteIP = #PoundSiteIP#, C_PoundSiteAddress = #PoundSiteAddress#, I_PoundSiteStatus = #PoundSiteStatus.IntValue#,
N_Range = #Range#, N_Accuracy = #Accuracy#, C_REDOPEN= #IsRedOpen.EntityValue#, C_UPDATEUSER = #updateUser#, C_UPDATETIME = to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss') where I_IntId = #IntId#
statements.select:
select a.I_INTID, a.C_PoundSiteNo, a.C_PoundSiteNickName, a.I_PoundSiteType, a.C_PoundSiteName, a.C_PoundSiteIP, a.C_PoundSiteAddress, a.I_PoundSiteStatus, a.N_Range, a.N_Accuracy, a.C_REDOPEN,
a.C_CREATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_CREATETIME, a.C_UPDATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_UPDATETIME from SM_PoundSite_Info a order by a.C_CREATETIME desc

select a.I_INTID, a.C_PoundSiteNo, a.C_PoundSiteNickName, a.I_PoundSiteType, a.C_PoundSiteName, a.C_PoundSiteIP, a.C_PoundSiteAddress, a.I_PoundSiteStatus, a.N_Range, a.N_Accuracy, a.C_REDOPEN,
a.C_CREATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_CREATETIME, a.C_UPDATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_UPDATETIME from SM_PoundSite_Info a where a.C_PoundSiteNo=#value# order by a.C_CREATETIME desc

select a.I_INTID, a.C_PoundSiteNo, a.C_PoundSiteNickName, a.I_PoundSiteType, a.C_PoundSiteName, a.C_PoundSiteIP, a.C_PoundSiteAddress, a.I_PoundSiteStatus, a.N_Range, a.N_Accuracy, a.C_REDOPEN,
a.C_CREATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_CREATETIME, a.C_UPDATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_UPDATETIME from SM_PoundSite_Info a where a.C_PoundSiteIP=#value# order by a.C_CREATETIME desc

select a.I_INTID, a.C_PoundSiteNo, a.C_PoundSiteNickName, a.I_PoundSiteType, a.C_PoundSiteName, a.C_PoundSiteIP, a.C_PoundSiteAddress, a.I_PoundSiteStatus, a.N_Range, a.N_Accuracy, a.C_REDOPEN,
a.C_CREATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_CREATETIME, a.C_UPDATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_UPDATETIME from SM_PoundSite_Info a where a.I_PoundSiteType=#value# order by a.C_CREATETIME desc

select a.I_INTID, a.C_PoundSiteNo, a.C_PoundSiteNickName, a.I_PoundSiteType, a.C_PoundSiteName, a.C_PoundSiteIP, a.I_PoundSiteStatus, a.C_PoundSiteAddress from SM_PoundSite_Info a where a.I_INTID=#value#

select a.I_INTID, a.C_PoundSiteNo, a.C_PoundSiteNickName, a.I_PoundSiteType, a.C_PoundSiteName, a.C_PoundSiteIP, a.I_PoundSiteStatus, a.C_PoundSiteAddress from SM_PoundSite_Info a where a.C_PoundSiteIP=#value#
select a.I_INTID, a.C_PoundSiteNo, a.C_PoundSiteNickName, a.I_PoundSiteType, a.C_PoundSiteName, a.C_PoundSiteIP, a.I_PoundSiteStatus, a.C_PoundSiteAddress from SM_PoundSite_Info a

select a.I_INTID, a.C_POUNDSITENO, a.C_POUNDSITENAME, a.C_POUNDSITENICKNAME, a.I_POUNDSITETYPE, a.C_POUNDSITEIP, a.C_POUNDSITEADDRESS, a.I_POUNDSITESTATUS, a.I_ISSETTLE, a.N_ACCURACY, a.N_RANGE, a.C_DVRIP, a.C_REDOPEN from sm_poundsite_info a where a.I_POUNDSITETYPE='1' and C_REDOPEN='1'

select a.I_INTID, a.C_POUNDSITENO, a.C_POUNDSITENAME, a.C_POUNDSITENICKNAME, a.I_POUNDSITETYPE, a.C_POUNDSITEIP, a.C_POUNDSITEADDRESS, a.I_POUNDSITESTATUS, a.I_ISSETTLE, a.N_ACCURACY, a.N_RANGE, a.C_DVRIP, a.C_REDOPEN from sm_poundsite_info a where a.I_POUNDSITETYPE='1' and C_REDOPEN='0'
